casebody.data:
CRAZIE OVERSTOCK PROMOTIONS, LLC
v.
James MCVICKER, in his personal and official capacity as Sheriff for Bladen County North Carolina; Jeffery Tyler, in his personal and official capacity as a Captain in the Bladen County Sheriff's Department No. 49P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Mr. Christopher J. Geis, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for McVicker, James, et al Mr. William J. Brian, Jr., Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Crazie Overstock Promotions, LLC Mr. Keith P. Anthony, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Crazie Overstock Promotions, LLC Mr. Patrick G. Spaugh, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for McVicker, James, et al Mr. Matthew L. Boyatt, Assistant Attorney General Mr. Sonny S. Haynes, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for McVicker, James, et al

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of February 2018 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
